sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { DollarSign, Users, Calendar, Info } from 'lucide-react'; import { Card, CardContent, CardHeader, CardTitle } from '../components/ui/card'; import { Badge } from '../components/ui/badge'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Button } from '../components/ui/button'; const Rates = () => { const rates = [ { title: "Day Visit", price: "R200", duration: "per person", time: "8am – 6pm", features: [ "Access for picnics & walks", "Wildlife spotting", "Explore Namaqualand scenery", "No overnight stay" ], badge: "Day Trip", color: "from-amber-100 to-orange-100" }, { title: "Overnight", price: "R300", duration: "per person / night", time: "Arrive after 2pm, depart by 10am", features: [ "One night camping", "Full facility access", "Bathroom & shower", "Kitchen & braai room" ], badge: "Popular", color: "from-green-100 to-emerald-100" }, { title: "Weekend", price: "R800", duration: "per person", time: "Friday – Sunday (2 nights)", features: [ "Perfect for getaways", "Full facility access", "Ideal for relaxation", "West coast camping" ], badge: "Best Value", color: "from-orange-100 to-amber-100" }, { title: "Weekly", price: "R1,800", duration: "per person", time: "Seven full days", features: [ "Immerse in nature", "Digital detox retreat", "Full facility access", "Great for remote work" ], badge: "Extended Stay", color: "from-green-100 to-lime-100" }, { title: "Monthly", price: "R6,000", duration: "per person", time: "30 days camping", features: [ "Flower season stays", "Long-term retreat", "Deep nature connection", "Best monthly rate" ], badge: "Long Stay", color: "from-blue-100 to-cyan-100" } ]; const additionalInfo = [ { icon: , title: "Children & Groups", items: [ "Children under 12: Half price", "Groups of 4+: Discount available (inquire)", "Family-friendly environment" ] }, { icon: , title: "Booking Details", items: [ "50% deposit required to confirm", "Contact for flower season rates", "Custom packages available" ] }, { icon: , title: "Extras & Fees", items: [ "Firewood available on-site", "No hidden fees", "Payment details upon booking" ] }, { icon: , title: "Important Notes", items: [ "No pets (wildlife protection)", "Service animals with advance notice", "Rates subject to change" ] } ]; return (
{/* Header */}

Rates & Pricing

Affordable rates for off-grid camping at De Riet – Namaqualand, Northern Cape

{/* Rates Grid */}
{rates.map((rate, index) => ( {rate.badge && (
{rate.badge}
)} {rate.title}
{rate.price} {rate.duration}

{rate.time}
    {rate.features.map((feature, idx) => (
  • {feature}
    • ))}
))}
{/* Additional Information */}

Additional Information

{additionalInfo.map((info, index) => (
{info.icon}

{info.title}

    {info.items.map((item, idx) => (
  • • {item}
    • ))}
))}
{/* CTA Section */}

Ready to Book Your Off-Grid Experience?

Contact us for availability, custom packages, or to inquire about group discounts and flower-season rates. Pieter & Allische are here to help!

); }; export default Rates;
